FuncDef:
The version command configures an ERPS version.
The undo version command restores the default ERPS version. The version command configures an ERPS version. The undo version command restores the default ERPS version. By default, ERPSv1 is used. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.
